title: Oru Devathai Vanthuvittal Lyrics Nee Varuvai Ena
stanzas: <div>Oru Devathai Vanthuvittal Lyrics Nee Varuvai Ena

devathai vanthu vitaal
unnai thaediye
vanna maalaigal sooda vandhaal
thanga thaerile

Oru devathai vanthu vitaal
ennai thaediye
vanna maalaigal sooda vandhaal
thanga thaerile

nooru nooru jenmem vazhndhirukka
noolil poovaipola saendhirukka
Deepam yaetri vaithu thaerizhukka
selai solai kondu saerthanaikka
punnagayil poo pooparikka

devathai vanthu vitaal
ennai thaediye
vanna maalaigal sooda vandhaal
thanga thaerile

pookkum sediyai ellaam
sirikkum poovei ellaam
un peyerai kettirundhaen

ettu thisaiyum serthu
ottrai thisaiyaai maatri
un varavaai paarthurinthen

kannukul kannukul undhan bimbam
nenjukul nenjukul undhan sandham
ullathai ullathai alli thanthaen
unidum unidum ennai thanthen

en nizhalil nee nadakka
en uyiril unnai vaithaen

devathai vanthu vitaal
ennai thaediye
vanna maalaigal sooda vandhaal
thanga thaerile
roja chedigal nattu
uyirai neeraai vittu
koonthalukku poo valarpaen

vetkam veesum roja
veliyil varum nerathil
veyilukku thadai vidhippaen

anbae un paathangal nogum endru
anggange poovalae paathai saiven
kanne un vaasathil naan irukka
kaatridam yosanai kaettuvaipen

en nizhalil nee nadakka
en uyiril unnai vaithaen

devathai vanthu vitaal
ennai thaediye
vanna maalaigal sooda vandhaal
thanga thaerile

nooru nooru jenmem vazhndhirukka
noolil poovaipola saendhirukka
Deepam yaetri vaithu thaerizhukka
selai solai kondu saerthanaikka
punnagayil poo pooparikka
